ms.safi.btsync

Class BTSyncClient

  • Object
    • ms.safi.btsync.BTSyncClient

  • public class BTSyncClient
extends Object
    BTSyncClient provides a number of methods used to interact with a running instance of BitTorrent Sync. These methods are based on the BitTorrent Sync Beta API
    Author:
    Omeed Safi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BTSyncClient(String listenAddress, String username, String password)
      Constructs a new BTSyncClient to interact with a running BitTorrent Sync instance.
      BTSyncClient(String address, String port, String username, String password)
      Constructs a new BTSyncClient to interact with a running BitTorrent Sync instance.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addFolder(File dir)
      Adds the given folder to BT Sync.

      Adds a folder to BT Sync using a secret in either selective sync or full download mode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BTSyncClient

        public BTSyncClient(String listenAddress,
            String username,
            String password)
        Constructs a new BTSyncClient to interact with a running BitTorrent Sync instance. This constructor is identical to BTSyncClient(String, String, String, String) that is provided only for convenience.
        Parameters:
        listenAddress - the address:port combination where BT Sync is listening
        username - the username for accessing BTSync
        password - the password for the user

      • BTSyncClient

        public BTSyncClient(String address,
            String port,
            String username,
            String password)
        Constructs a new BTSyncClient to interact with a running BitTorrent Sync instance.
        Parameters:
        address - the address of the device running BT Sync
        port - the port BT Sync is listening to
        username - the username for accessing BTSync
        password - the password for the user

    • Method Detail

      • getFolders

        public java.util.List<Folder> getFolders()
        Returns info for all Folders being managed by BT Sync.
        Returns:
        the Folders containing all folder info

      • getFolder

        public Folder getFolder(String secret)
        Returns info for the Folder being managed by BT Sync identified by the given secret.
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        Returns:
        the Folder containing info

      • addFolder

        public boolean addFolder(File dir)
        Adds the given folder to BT Sync. The folder MUST exist before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        dir - the File describing the folder to be added
        Returns:
        true if the folder was added to Sync; false otherwise (call getLastError() for cause)

      • addFolder

        public boolean addFolder(String dir)
        Adds the given folder to BT Sync. The folder MUST exist before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        dir - the path to the folder to be added
        Returns:
        true if the folder was added to Sync; false otherwise (call getLastError() for cause)

      • addFolder

        public boolean addFolder(File dir,
                String secret,
                boolean selectiveSync)
        Adds a folder to BT Sync using a secret in either selective sync or full download mode. The folder MUST exist before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        dir - the File describing the folder to be added
        secret - the secret of the folder to be added
        selectiveSync - whether the folder should use selective syncing or not
        Returns:
        true if the folder was added to Sync; false otherwise (call getLastError() for cause)

      • addFolder

        public boolean addFolder(String dir,
                String secret,
                boolean selectiveSync)
        Adds a folder to BT Sync using a secret in either selective sync or full download mode. The folder MUST exist before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        dir - the path to the folder to be added
        secret - the secret of the folder to be added
        selectiveSync - whether the folder should use selective syncing or not
        Returns:
        true if the folder was added to Sync; false otherwise (call getLastError() for cause)

      • removeFolder

        public boolean removeFolder(String secret)
        Removes the folder from BT Sync using the folder's secret WITHOUT deleting anything from the disk.
        Parameters:
        secret - the secret of the folder to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the folder was removed from Sync; false otherwise (call getLastError() for cause)

      • getFiles

        public java.util.List<File> getFiles(String secret)
        Returns info for the contents of a folder identified by the given secret. The information returned is for both files and folders in the directory.
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        Returns:
        the file information for the contents of the folder

      • getFiles

        public java.util.List<File> getFiles(String secret,
                            String path)
        Returns info for the contents of a subdirectory of a folder identified by the given secret. The information returned is for both files and folders in the directory.
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        path - the path within the root folder
        Returns:
        the file information for the contents of the folder

      • setFilePreferences

        public File setFilePreferences(String secret,
                      String path,
                      boolean download)
        Sets the selective sync option for a file at the given path within the folder identified by the given secret.
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        path - the path to the file within the root folder
        download - whether the file should be selectively synced or not
        Returns:
        the file with applied preferences

      • getFolderPeers

        public java.util.List<Peer> getFolderPeers(String secret)
        Returns the peers connected to the folder identified by the given secret.
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        Returns:
        the peers of a folder

      • getSecrets

        public Secrets getSecrets()
        Generates read-write, read-only, and encryption read-only secrets. The encryption secret is to grant read only permission but the contents remains encrypted.
        Returns:
        the secrets

      • getSecrets

        public Secrets getSecrets(String secret)
        Returns the secrets available to use for sharing a folder identified by the given secret.

        NOTE: This will generate the read-write and read-only secrets only. It is unclear if this is intended behavior or not, see the following thread: http://forum.bittorrent.com/topic/24794-no-encrypted-secret-on-existing-folder-secrets/

        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        Returns:
        the secrets

      • getFolderPreferences

        public FolderPreferences getFolderPreferences(String secret)
        Returns the preferences of the folder identified by the given secret.
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        Returns:
        the folder preferences

      • setFolderPreferences

        public FolderPreferences setFolderPreferences(String secret,
                                     FolderPreferences prefs)
        Sets the preferences for the folder identified by the given secret.
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        prefs - the preferences
        Returns:
        the updated preferences for the folder

      • setFolderPreferences

                                     boolean useDht,

                                     boolean useSyncTrash)

        useDht -
        useHosts -
        searchLan -
        useRelayServer -
        useTracker -
        useSyncTrash -
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        Returns:
        the hosts

      • setFolderHosts

        public Hosts setFolderHosts(String secret,
                   Hosts hosts)
        Sets the hosts for a folder identified by the given secret. The exists hosts for the folder will be overwritten
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        hosts - the hosts
        Returns:
        the updated hosts

      • setFolderHosts

        public Hosts setFolderHosts(String secret,
                   String... hosts)
        Sets the hosts (in the address:port format) for a folder identified by the given secret. The exists hosts for the folder will be overwritten
        Parameters:
        secret - the folder's secret
        hosts - the hosts
        Returns:
        the updated hosts

      • getPreferences

        public BTSyncPreferences getPreferences()
        Returns the preferences for the running instance of BitTorrent Sync, including the advanced preferences.
        Returns:
        the preferences

        public BTSyncPreferences setPreferences(BTSyncPreferences prefs)
        Sets the preferences (including advanced preferences) for the running instance of BitTorrent Sync.
        Parameters:
        prefs - the preferences
        Returns:
        the updated preferences
